General.Name: Neo Cremar Co. Ltd
General.Description: Neo Cremar Co.,Ltd produces and sells functional food ingredients and additives in South Korea and internationally. It offers amino acids, vitamins, minerals, sugar substitutions, organic products, sweeteners, functional materials, sweetness/taste enhancers, premixes, active solutions, and antimicrobials and deodorizers. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
